All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Action
Represents the action that a player can do during the game.
ActionPhaseSceneControllers
 
AskMessage
This abstract class is extended by all the messages that are sent by the server for requests.
AssistantCard
 
AssistantCardReply
This message is sent by the client to communicate to server that the current player has played an assistant card.
AssistantCardRequest
This message is sent by the server to ask the player to play an assistant card which is in his deck.
AssistantCardSceneController
 
AssistantCardType
This enum contains all the assistant card types.

CardEffect11
 
CardEffect12
 
ChangeInfluenceMessage
This message is sent by the server to communicate to the players that an island has a new dominator.
ChangePhaseMessage
This message is sent by the server to communicate to the players that a new phase of the game is beginning.
ChangeTurnException
This exception is thrown when a player ends his round.
ChangeTurnMessage
This message is sent by the server to communicate to new current player that now it's his turn.
CharacterCard
 
CharacterCard01Reply
This message is sent by the client to communicate to server the color and the id of the island chosen by the current player in order to build and apply the effect of the character card 01.
CharacterCard03Reply
This message is sent by the client to communicate to server the id of the island chosen by the current player in order to build and apply the effect of the character card 03.
CharacterCard05Reply
This message is sent by the client to communicate to server the id of the island chosen by the current player in order to build and apply the effect of the character card 05.
CharacterCard07Reply
This message is sent by the client to communicate to server the students from current player's entrance and from the card chosen by the current player in order to build and apply the effect of the character card 07.
CharacterCard09Reply
This message is sent by the client to communicate to server the color chosen by the current player in order to build and apply the effect of the character card 09.
CharacterCard10Reply
This message is sent by the client to communicate to server the students from current player's dining room and current player's entrance chosen by him in order to build and apply the effect of the character card 10.
CharacterCard11Reply
This message is sent by the client to communicate to server the color chosen by the current player in order to build and apply the effect of the character card 11.
CharacterCard12Reply
This message is sent by the client to communicate to server the color chosen by the current player in order to build and apply the effect of the character card 12.
CharacterCardParameterRequest
This message is sent by the server to ask the current player the parameters of the character card in order to build the effect.
CharacterCardReply
This abstract class is extended by all the messages sent by the client that are used to communicate to server the parameters to build the effects of the character cards.
CharacterCardSceneController
 
CharacterCardWithParametersException
This exception is thrown when a character card selected by the player needs some parameters to build his effect.
CharCard01SceneController
 
CharCard0305SceneController
 
CharCard07SceneController
 
CharCard091112SceneController
 
CharCard10SceneController
 
ChooseCloudTile
 
ChooseCloudTileSceneController
 
Cli
 
Client
 
ClientApp
 
ClientMessage
This abstract class is extended by all the messages sent by the client used to reply to server requests.
ClientMessageErrorVisitor
ClientMessageErrorVisitor manages error situations in controller.
ClientMessageExceptionalVisitor
ClientMessageExceptionalVisitor manages exceptional situations in controller.
ClientMessageModifierVisitor
ClientMessageModifierVisitor modifies parameters, basing on received messages.
ClientMessageStandardVisitor
ClientMessageStandardVisitor manages exceptional situations in controller.
ClientModel
This class saves the state of the game and relevant information.
ClientView
This interface contains all the methods of cli/gui that are useful to show requests from server and to allow the player to reply to them.
CloudTile
 
CloudTileReply
This message is sent by the client to communicate to server the id of the cloud tile chosen by the current player.
CloudTileRequest
This message is sent by the server to ask the current player which cloud tile wants to fetch students from it.
CloudTilesInfoMessage
This message is sent by the server to communicate to the players that cloud tiles are now filled with new students.
Color
 
Controller
Controller is used to manage the game flow, using visitor pattern to modify the model and to send the correct following message, basing on ClientMessage type Controller is notified by virtual view, when a new message is received Login, number of players and game mode are not managed here, but in server Controller catches all exceptions that model throws
DisconnectionMessage
This message is sent by the server to communicate to the players that one player has disconnected and so, they will be disconnected instantly.
EmptyBagMessage
This message is sent by the server to communicate to the players that the bag is empty and this round will be the last one.
EmptyGeneralCoinSupplyException
This exception is thrown when the general coin supply is empty and so, the player will not receive an additional coin.
EmptyGeneralCoinSupplyMessage
This message is sent by the server to communicate to the player that the general coin supply is empty, so he won't receive an additional coin after moving a student onto a specific position of his school board.
EndGameException
This exception is thrown when the game reaches some conditions: 1.
ErrorMessage
This message is sent by the server to communicate an error that occurs during an operation or after an input check.
ErrorTypeID
Contains some types of errors that can occurred during the execution of the game.
ExpertGame
 
ExpertGameInfoMessage
This message is sent by the server to communicate to the players some game information.
ExpertMoveStudentIntoDiningRoom
 
Game
 
GameDecorator
This decorator provides additional methods that can be called in expertGame.
GameInfoMessage
This message is sent by the server to communicate to the players some game information.
GameMode
This class contains all the declaration of the methods that are in game and expertGame classes.
GameModeAndNumOfPlayersSceneController
 
GameState
LOGIN: includes the insert of username, number of players and tower color.
GeneralCoinSupply
 
GenericMessage
This message is sent by the server to communicate generic information.
GiveAssistantDeckMessage
This message is sent by the server to give to every player his assistant deck.
Gui
 
GuiApplication
 
IllegalClientInputException
This exception is thrown when the player input is uncorrected.
InfluenceStrategy
 
InfluenceStrategyDefault
This class contains code that is used by Default and Effect08.
InfluenceStrategyWithEffect06
 
InfluenceStrategyWithEffect08
 
InfluenceStrategyWithEffect09
 
InfoAssistantCardPlayedMessage
This message is sent by the server to communicate to the other players which assistant card is played by the current player in the game.
InfoCharacterCardPlayedMessage
This message is sent by the server to communicate which character card is selected by the current player.
InfoChosenCloudTileMessage
This message is sent by the server to communicate which cloud tile is chosen by the current player.
InfoMessage
This abstract class is extended by all the messages that are sent by the server to communicate some updates to all clients.
InfoMessageVisitor
 
InfoStudentIntoDiningRoomMessage
This message is sent by the server to communicate that the current player has moved one of his students from his entrance to his dining room.
InfoStudentOntoIslandMessage
This message is sent by the server to communicate that the current player has moved one of his students onto an island.
InfoWithReceiverMessage
This abstract class is extended by all the messages that are sent by the server to communicate some updates to a specific client.
InputReadTask
This class implements a task so reading can be executed on a different thread.
IpAddressSceneController
 
Island
 
IslandManager
 
LastMoveException
This exception is thrown when the player doesn't have to do other moves.
LobbyMessage
This message is sent by the server to communicate the online players' usernames and the maximum number of players of the game.
LoginReply
This message is sent by the server to communicate to the new player that now he's logged in correctly.
LoginRequest
This message is sent by the client to communicate to server that a new player wants to log in.
LoginSceneController
 
MainSceneController
 
MenuSceneController
 
MergeIslandsMessage
This message is sent by the server to communicate to the players that 2 islands are merged and the new island has a dominator.
Message
 
MotherNature
 
MotherNaturePositionMessage
This message is sent by the server to communicate to the players the new position of mother nature.
MotherNatureReply
This message is sent by the client to communicate to server the number of steps that mother nature has to do according to the current player.
MotherNatureRequest
This message is sent by the server to ask the current player how many steps mother nature has to do.
MotherNatureStepsSceneController
 
MoveStudentFromEntranceMessage
This message is sent by the server to ask the current player which student wants to move from his entrance.
MoveStudentFromEntranceSceneController
 
MoveStudentIntoDiningRoom
 
MoveStudentOntoDiningRoomMessage
This message is sent by the client to communicate to server the color of the student the current player wants to move to his dining room.
MoveStudentOntoIsland
 
MoveStudentOntoIslandMessage
This message is sent by the client to communicate to server the color of the student the current player wants to move and the id of the destination island.
MoveTowerOntoIslandMessage
This message is sent by the server to communicate to the players that one player has moved his towers onto an island.
MoveTowerOntoSchoolBoardMessage
This message is sent by the server to communicate to the players that one player had to move his towers back to his school board.
Observable<T>
 
Observer<T>
 
PlayAssistantCard
 
Player
 
PlayersNumberAndGameModeReply
This message is sent by the client to communicate to server how many players the first player wants in the game and if he wants the expert mode or not.
PlayersNumberAndGameModeRequest
This message is sent from the server to ask the first player the parameters of the game such as the number of players and game mode (expert or not).
PlayerTurnComparator
 
ProfessorsManager
 
ProfessorStrategy
 
ProfessorStrategyDefault
 
ProfessorStrategyWithEffect
 
SceneController
 
SchoolBoard
 
ServeOneClient
Each player must be treated as a thread
Server
This class utilizes the Singleton pattern; It must be instantiated only once.
ServerApp
 
ServerMessage
This abstract class is extended by all the messages that are sent by the server.
ServerMessageVisitor
This visitor manages messages sent by the server to establish which view methods to call and to modify the client model.
TieMessage
This message is sent by the server to communicate which players have tied.
TowerColor
This enum contains all the colors of the towers in the game.
TowerColorReply
This message is sent by the client to communicate to server which tower color the current player chose.
TowerColorRequest
This message is sent from the server to ask a player which tower color wants in the game.
TowerColorSceneController
 
UpdatedServerInfoMessage
This message is not send by the client or server, but it's useful to communicate the IP address that the user has written to connect to the server.
UpdateIslandWithNoEntryTilesMessage
This message is sent by the server to communicate to all the players the island with a new number of no entry tiles on it.
UpdateWalletMessage
This message is sent by the server to communicate to the current player that his wallet is increased adding 1 coin.
UseCharacterCard
 
UseCharacterCardRequest
This message is sent by the client to communicate to server that the current player wants to play a character card.
Utility
 
View
This interface contains method prototypes that are called by the virtual view on server.
VirtualView
This class is used by the server to call view methods.
Wallet
 
WinMessage
This message is sent by the server to communicate the win to the winner player.
Wizard
This enum contains all the wizards of the game.
WizardReply
This message is sent by the client to communicate to the server which wizard the player chose.
WizardRequest
This message is sent from the server to ask a player which wizard wants in the game.
WizardSceneController
